text: Even so, the king of Assyria sent his commander-in-chief, his head officer, and his army general,18:17. Literally, “Tartan, Rab-saris, and Rabshakeh.” However, they are Assyrian titles, not personal names. along with a large army, from Lachish to King Hezekiah at Jerusalem. They approached Jerusalem and made camp beside the aqueduct of the upper pool, on the road to where laundry is washed.
